protein.general_function: Involved in G-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
protein.specific_function: Receptor for relaxins. The activity of this receptor is mediated by G proteins leading to stimulation of adenylate cyclase and an increase of cAMP. Binding of the ligand may also activate a tyrosine kinase pathway that inhibits the activity of a phosphodiesterase that degrades cAMP

go_class.description: cell surface receptor linked signaling pathway
g-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
